Package model

Class ClinicHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ClinicHistory
  • public class ClinicHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information of the clinical histories of the pets

      • ClinicHistory

        public ClinicHistory​(boolean status,
                     java.lang.String symptom,
                     java.lang.String diagnosis,
                     Mascot datas,
                     Date admissionDate,
                     Date exitDate)
        ClinicHistory constructor
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the history. this param must be not null.
        symptom - the symptomsof the mascot. this param must be not null.
        diagnostic - the diagnostic of the mascot. this param must be not null.
        datas - the mascot this param must be not null.
        admissionDate - the hospitalized day . this param must be not null.
        exitDate - the discharge date. this param could be null.

      • addDrug

        public java.lang.String addDrug​(java.lang.String name,
                                double dose,
                                double costDose,
                                double frecuency)
        Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        name - The medicine name. This param must be not null.
        dose - The medicine dose, this param refers to the amount of medicine supplied to the pet each time according the frequence assigned. This param must be not null.
        costDose - The medicine cost by each dose. This param could be empty.
        frequency - The frequency of medicine application. This param could be empty.
        Returns:
        A message that indiques if medicine was added to the patient clinic story

      • addNotesToHospitalizationFatality

        public void addNotesToHospitalizationFatality​(java.lang.String notes)
        Description This method allows to add new notes to the possible diagnostic during the hospitalization at the patient stories. pre: The patient clinic story must be not null. post: New notes were added to the possible diagnostic in the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        notes - notes of possible diagnostic. This param must be not null.

      • addSymptoms

        public void addSymptoms​(java.lang.String symptoms)
        Description This method allows to add a new symptom presented during the hospitalization at the patient stories. pre: The patient clinic story must be not null. post: A new symptom were added to the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        symptoms - new symptom presented. This param must be not null.
